title: Learning Research Simulation for Early Childhood Learning Design and Improvement of Teacher Awareness

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of introductory educational theory and mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: A simulation environment designed to apply Learning Study in early childhood education settings. VR recreates actual kindergarten classroom situations, and participants experience the learning design process through interactions with virtual children.

learning_goals: The learning design process for early childhood mathematics can be explained by applying the Learning Study methodology
Early childhood learning outcomes in VR simulation environments can be observed, and differences from teacher perceptions can be analyzed in three or more ways
Two or more improvement proposals reflecting assessments of early childhood learning potential can be suggested through project-based evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
